about_the_game:
Game play.

This is a single player FPS game. Starting in the 2170s, there are two tribes in total. The main character is a human being.

Information

It is still in the early stages of development and there is making games with TENGINE.

Through future updates, we will make a difference in the overall game through multiplay.

Multiplayer

Multiplayer is generally a mode system, and multiplayer has two servers, Vanilla and Mode (plugin), and you create your own. The user who creates the server can freely make various changes through the API, and although it may be difficult, they will try various changes such as maps, interface changes, weapons changes, and mini games.

The user who creates the server can freely make various changes through the API, and although it may be difficult, they will try various changes such as maps, interface changes, weapons changes, and mini games.
name: THE END: Pronton

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i7-5xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i7 8xxx
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3090
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Drogas ilícitas

short_description: The chaotic Earth has barely regained stability, but meets a force called Poroton beyond the universe...
